name: mufin
tag_list: music-recommendation, broadcast-monitoring-of-advertisement, visual-music-navigation, mood-playlists, live-tv-channel-detection, social-tv--second-screen, interactive-advertising, duplicate-removal--asset-management, copyright-clearing, audience-measureme
overview:
mufin offers first-class mobile and server solutions for audio identification and music recommendation that create new revenue streams for its customers.

The complete product portfolio offers white label solutions and licenses for the technology to the B2B sector. mufin’s B2B solutions reach a variety of customer groups including social TV platform providers, targeted/interactive advertising platform providers, digital agencies, brands, broadcast monitoring service providers, app developers, video & audio online services, music streaming service providers, media research companies and music download shops among others.

mufin develops digital signal processing technologies on the basis of sound analysis which automate the process of recognizing, discovering, navigating and managing content in the digital age. mufin’s audio recognition and music recommendation technologies can be used on mobile devices, desktops, servers and the web.

mufin - formerly known as m2any - was founded in 2005 as a spin-off company of the renowned Fraunhofer Institute for Digital Media Technology (IDMT). In 2007, MAGIX AG acquired m2any and the patents for audio identification and music recommendation and created the subsidiary company mufin. Today, mufin is fully owned by MAGIX AG.
